name: articles_v2_list_trending
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seeking_alpha.
Tool description: Query for news, market moving, price quotes, chart, indices, analysis from investors and experts, etc...
API description: Fetches a list of trending articles from the Seeking Alpha API within a specified date range and limits the response size.

since.description:
Unix timestamp (Epoch timestamp), ex : 1636693199
Maybe use together with 'until' parameter to filter data by date range

until.description:
Unix timestamp (Epoch timestamp), ex : 1636693199
Maybe use together with 'since' parameter to filter data by date range

size.description: Number of items per response (max 40). Defaults to 20.
